title: SoftBank Stock Has Been Battered by WeWork. It’s Time to Give It Another Look, Analyst Says.
text:
SoftBank Group poses an investment conundrum. Masayoshi Son’s weird and complex Japanese conglomerate has been ravaged in recent months by a toxic brew of bad investments and terrible press. It is the largest investor in deeply troubled WeWork parent We Co. Big bets on ride-sharing businesses, including Uber Technologies and Didi Chuxing, have not paid off to date.

While the company has generated strong returns on its investment in Slack Technologies (ticker: WORK), that stock’s weak performance since completing its recent...
description: The Japanese conglomerate has been ravaged in recent months by a toxic brew of bad investments and terrible press. LightShed Partners lays out the bull and bear cases.
